text: Theodoric the Great (454–August 30, 526), known to the Romans as Flavius Theodoricus, was king of the Ostrogoths (488–526), ruler of Italy (493–526), and regent of the Visigoths (511–526). He united several German tribes and encouraged Arianism. == Other websites == * Theodoric the Great at MiddleAges.net * New Advent Category:454 births Category:526 deaths Category:Kings and Queens of Italy
title: Theodoric the Great
